title: Virtual Assistant/Graphics & Video Editor NEEDED
salary: Around $200USD - $400USD per month, with potential for more work/time/pay
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant/Video Editor NEEDED (Experienced!) PAYS WELL!
I am looking for an experienced Virtual Assistant who is SMART,
FAST and works hard.
I currently have 12 staff members and looking to add my first virtual member!  My staff loves me, and I LOVE THEM.
I am looking to add someone HARD WORKING, HONEST and
DEDICATED to the TEAM as soon as possible!
Must be technologically SAVVY. We all work hard and move fast.
There are strict deadlines for everything. So this is a GREAT job
with PLENTY of work available, but you must be willing to
commit!
If this sounds like you, reply to this job post with your experience in Kajabi, Squarespace, Upgrade to see actual infonce (it's okay if not, I can teach you), Canva (or similar) and Simple Video Editing software (i.e. CapCut)
and your wildest ghost story or possible alien encounter
